text: Chief Bode Akindele (2 June 1932 â€“ 29 June 2020) was a Nigerian billionaire businessman. According to The Daily Telegraph, he was worth about $1.19 billion. He was the owner and Chairman of Madandola group of companies. He was born in Oyo, Oyo. Akindele died on 29 June 2020 at his home in Lagos, aged 88. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Nigerian businesspeople Category:People from Oyo State
title: Bode Akindele
